subject: Automobiles
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The Nascar driver Kyle Busch was clocked by a North Carolina sheriff’s deputy going 128 miles an hour in a 45-m.p.h. zone and was cited for careless and reckless driving and speeding, a sheriff’s spokesman said.
snippet: The Nascar driver Kyle Busch was clocked by a North Carolina sheriff’s deputy going 128 miles an hour in a 45-m.p.h. zone and was cited for careless and reckless driving and speeding, a sheriff’s spokesman said.
